participant_1.background:
I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
i work as a freelance accountant.
My back pain is a constant reminder of my old job as a mover.
i like to live off of the land.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
we drink beer and eat food.
My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing.
I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I am excited to be moving into a new home.
Congratulations! That's exciting! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving to a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up. I'm looking forward to being closer to my parents and to being able to help them out as they get older.
That's wonderful! I'm sure your parents are excited to have you closer to them. I'm also from the Midwest, and I love it here. There's something so peaceful about small town life.
I agree! I love the sense of community in small towns. I'm also looking forward to being able to grow my own food and live off the land.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be more self-sufficient, but I don't have the space for a garden at my current home.
I'm lucky that my new home has a large backyard, so I'll have plenty of space to grow my own fruits and vegetables. I'm also excited to be able to raise my own chickens.
Chickens are great! They're so much fun to have around. I love collecting their eggs.
Me too! I can't wait to have fresh eggs for breakfast every morning.
Sounds like you're going to have a great time in your new home! I'm excited for you.
